name: Mika's Directional
alt: X, Y, and Z coordinates and facing direction appear above the Minecraft hotbar
desc: Adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction!
overview: Never get lost again! Mika's Directional is a Minecraft 1.18 plugin that adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction! This action bar appears upon movement and disappears after no movement over a short period of time.
features:
• Enabling or disabling the coordinates and/or facing direction
  • Changing the color of the labels and values
  • Changing server-wide defaults for both of the above
  • Optional permissions to restrict customization via in-game commands and who can reload the config in-game
